query: SELECT id, name, description, regularPrice, bundlePrice, savings, courseIds FROM course_bundles;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT id, name, description, regularPrice, bundlePrice, savings, courseIds FROM course_bundles;

rows.name: Foundation Bundle - 3 Core Frameworks
rows.description: Master the three most important AI safety frameworks: EU AI Act, NIST AI RMF, and ISO 42001. Perfect for beginners.

rows.name: Complete Certification - All 7 Modules
rows.description: The ultimate AI safety certification covering ALL regional frameworks. Become a globally recognized AI safety expert.
